reviewText: Outstanding and very informative series. I would like to see more like it about the American West.

Saw these on tv and loved them.  So glad to see they were available on dvd through Amazon.  I got mine, a friend and I watched them, and he had to have a set for himself.  These are really nice, telling things as they were, taking away the myths and showing the real trials the folks went through baack in the 19th century, both the good and the bad.
I enjoyed this very much.  In particular the episode that shows around the two museums.  I only wish there were more DVDs like this showing the inside of museums, thanks Harry Carry JR!

Seems like this film lacks in about every area.  It is a documentary and not a good one.  Sort of skims the surface in all areas reviewed.  The narration is weak at best and there are not enough details to make is historically correct.
